alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 21 at 3:10PM EST until January 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 6 to 10 feet in the surf zone. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Hatteras Island and Northern Outer Banks. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Minor ocean overwash and beach erosion is possible and could impact portions of Hwy 12 on Hatteras Island during high tide. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions expected and localized beach erosion possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Duck NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 2.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/10 PM 5.0 1.3 2.1 8 None 22/10 AM 5.7 2.0 2.4 7 Minor 22/10 PM 3.7 0.0 0.8 6 None 23/11 AM 3.4 -0.3 0.3 4-5 None 23/11 PM 3.3 -0.4 0.2 3 None 24/11 AM 3.2 -0.5 0.4 3 None Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/09 PM 0.1 -0.5 -0.2 1 None 22/11 AM 0.3 -0.3 -0.2 1 None 22/11 PM 0.8 0.2 0.3 1 None 23/12 PM 0.9 0.3 0.4 1 None 24/01 AM 1.1 0.5 0.6 1 None 24/12 PM 0.8 0.2 0.4 1 None Coast Guard Hatteras NC MLLW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 4.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/09 PM 1.9 0.7 1.3 2 None 22/10 AM 2.5 1.3 1.7 2 Minor 22/10 PM 1.7 0.5 1.0 1-2 None 23/11 AM 1.6 0.4 0.8 1 None 24/12 AM 1.7 0.5 1.0 1 None 24/11 AM 1.4 0.2 0.7 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
